name: Friends Killing Friends
description:
Friends Killing Friends is a PVP deathmatch where you kill your friend with a gun and a bunch of cards.

With public matchmaking and private rooms.

And 5 unique characters to choose from.

Tell your friend that you know a cool place and come beat each other's asses here.

A Pinnit4 & Brainwash Gang project.

COMING SOON:

  • More cards: up to 100 different cards, adding spice to every match.
  • More arenas: The rooftop won't be the only place in this city where you can kill your friends!
  • Deck building: define a strategy, and build your card deck around it. You like to go berserk? Add more guns! You rather take it painfully slow? Fill it up with debuffs for your rivals!
  • Account & level system: gain experience with every match, and unlock new cards to use in your fights.
  • Offline game modes: target practice, obstacle courses & AI training modes will be available to complement the main deathmatch mode.
